title: WWE.2K15+DLC - RELOADED
description:
ABOUT THE GAME

WWE 2K15 ushers in a new era of WWE video games! WWE 2K15 brings the hardest hitting and most fluid WWE gameplay to date, closer than ever to what fans see on WWE TV. With significant gameplay enhancements, a presentation overhaul, and all-new MyCAREER and 2K Showcase game modes, WWE 2K15 delivers the most authentic and action-packed WWE video game experience to date.

Feel every blow, hear every impact. WWE 2K15. Feel It.

FEATURES

Includes every single piece of downloadable content*:

Immediate access to Playable Hulk Hogan and Hollywood Hogan:

Immediate access to Sting Playable Characters Pack:
For the first time EVER in a WWE ring, ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s showtime! Receive two versions of the legend Sting! Play as blonde-haired retro Sting clad in neon colors, or as the intimidating silent warrior that battled the nWo!
WCW Character Pack*:
During the Monday Night Wars, WCW dominated WWE for 83 straight weeks. Relive the Monday Night Wars with five of the toughest legends from WCW Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Ã¢â‚¬Å“the Belfast BruiserÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Fit Finlay, Lord Steven Regal, Ã¢â‚¬Å“the Beast from the EastÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Bam Bam Bigelow, Diamond Dallas Page, and Ã¢â‚¬Å“the Total PackageÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Lex Luger, all in one add-on pack. WCWÃ¢â‚¬Â¦Where the Big Boys Play.
NXT Arrival Character Pack*:
Play as some of the brightest Superstars to ever step foot in an NXT ring with the all new NXT ArRIVAL pack! The future starts now with playable NXT characters such as Adam Rose, Konnor and Viktor of The Ascension, NXT Diva Emma and Former WWE Champion and Monday Night Raw Announcer JBL!
New Moves Pack*:
Gain access to over 30 new moves to add to your arsenal with the WWE 2K15 New Moves Pack add-on! Perform exciting new moves like Uso Crazy and the Spinning Powerbomb, as well as variations of Bray WyattÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Sister Abigail and CesaroÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Gutwrench Suplex.
Accelerator*:
Decide the overall rankings and attribute levels of every WWE Superstar, Legend, and Diva in the game. Unlock every WWE Superstar, Legend, and Diva, including alternate attires and all arenas and championships in WWE 2K15.
Showcase Ã¢â‚¬â€œ One More Match*:
Relive the heated Randy Orton and Christian rivalry with hours of new 2K Showcase action in One More Match! Battle through epic matches as their story is told through your gameplay and historical WWE footage. Also get playable WWE Superstars from 2011: Christian, Randy Orton, Edge, Mark Henry and Sheamus and 2011 arenas: SmackDown, Extreme Rules, Over the Limit and Capitol Punishment.
Showcase Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Hall of Pain*:
WorldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Strongest Slam your way through the competition in this new WWE 2K15 2K Showcase Hall Of Pain! Relive Mark HenryÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s rise to dominance from 2011-2013 through classic WWE footage and bone-crushing matches. Unlock new historical versions of Mark Henry, Big Show, Kane, The Usos, Sheamus, The Great Khali and more! Also receive playable arenas such as Vengeance(2011) and WrestleMania 29.
Showcase Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Path of the Warrior*:
Feel the power of the Ultimate Warrior with the WWE 2K15 Ã¢â‚¬Å“Path Of The WarriorÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ 2K Showcase! Relive his career through historic WWE footage and receive playable legends such as: Ultimate Warrior, Hulk Hogan, AndrÃƒÂ© the Giant, Sgt. Slaughter, Macho King and more!. Also receive playable arenas such as: WrestleMania VI, VII and XII; SummerSlamÃ‚Â®; Saturday NightÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Main Event and Madison Square Garden.



DLC:

It adds WWE Diva Paige to the playable roster as an exclusive extra. The Pass also unlocks all content within the base game, while providing three new campaigns for 2K Showcase mode. 2K Showcase allows players to relive classic rivalries from WWE history. For example, 2K15 ships with a showcase of John Cena and CM Punk's feud. 

Accelerator
Players will gain instant access to all unlockable content available in the game (excluding downloadable content);

2K Showcase: One More Match
Story focused on the rivalry between WWE Superstars Randy Orton and Christian in 2011;
Playable WWE Superstars: Christian, Randy Orton, Edge, Mark Henry and Sheamus;
Playable arenas from 2011: SmackDownÃ‚Â®, Extreme RulesÃ‚Â®, Over the LimitÃ‚Â® and Capitol PunishmentÃ‚Â®;

2K Showcase: Hall of Pain
Story focused on top matches for WWE Superstar Mark Henry;
Playable WWE Superstars: Mark Henry, Big Show, Kane, Jey Uso, Jimmy Uso, Sheamus, The Great Khali, Randy Orton, Daniel Bryan and Ryback;
Playable arenas: SmackDown (2011), VengeanceÃ‚Â® (2011) and WrestleManiaÃ‚Â® 29;

2K Showcase: Path of the Warrior
Story focused on the career of WWE Hall of Famer Ultimate Warrior;
Playable WWE Hall of Famers: Ultimate Warrior, Hulk Hogan, Andre the Giant and Sgt. Slaughter;
Playable WWE Legends: Honky Tonk Man, Rick Rude, Macho King and Colonel Mustafa;
Playable WWE Superstars: Undertaker and Hunter Hearst Helmsley;
Access to WWE Hall of Fame ring announcer Howard Finkel and WWE managers Jimmy Hart, Bobby Heenan, Paul Bearer, Sherri, Sid Justice and General Adnan;
Playable arenas: WrestleMania VI, VII and XII; SummerSlamÃ‚Â® (1988, 1990 and 1991); Saturday NightÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Main Event XXIV and Madison Square GardenÃ‚Â®;
Not all of WWE 2K15's DLC is unlocked through the Season Pass, though. These add-ons will be available for individual purchase sometime after the game's release: 

WCW Pack
Playable WCW Superstars: Fit Finlay, Lord Steven Regal, Bam Bam Bigelow, Diamond Dallas Page and Lex Luger;

NXT Arrival
Playable NXT Superstars: JBL, Adam Rose and The Ascension (Konnor and Victor);
Playable NXT Diva: Emma;

New Moves Pack
Moves Pack: More than 30 new moves, including an alternate version of Sister Abigail (performed from the ring corner and made popular by Bray Wyatt) and Multiple Gut Wrenches (made popular by Cesaro);

2K didn't announce any release dates for the DLC. However, they say the content will be released throughout late 2014 and early 2015. 

WWE 2K15 will debut on PS3 and Xbox 360 on October 28th. The PS4 and Xbox One versions will follow on November 18th.
